name: MAN - SPIDER
description:
**Attention : the controls might not work if you are not in full screen mode.

After a horrible accident at a nuclear plant, an innocent spider falls from a tree into the mouth of a radio-active worker at the plant and is bitten by him. The aftermath creates a Giant Spider Monster called " MAN-SPIDER ". now "you are the monster" and trying to understand the consequences that lead to this transition...

Controls:

W : jump

A/D : move left/right

Instructions:

crush the police by stomping on them.

When a police is crushed you can pick them by pressing E

When you have a police in your hand you can make them into a cocoon by pressing R

You can Climb Buildings by Pressing Q

You can kick the police into the air by jumping next to them.
